required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Amino Acid Formulation on Healthy Men Undergoing Unilateral Knee Immobilization
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Amino Acid Formulation on Healthy Men Undergoing Unilateral Knee Immobilization

brief_summary.textblock: This is a safety and tolerability study investigating the effect of an amino acid formulation in healthy volunteers during and after limb immobilization.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: 2 groups of 10 each will be randomized to receive amino acid supplementation or placebo for 28 days during which they will have one leg immobilized by a removable brace.
study_design_info.masking_description: Sachets with the supplement will be blinded to the participant, and research assistants. Outcomes assessors will be blinded to condition as well.

primary_outcome.description: To determine the impact of an amino acid formulation on muscle atrophy after 7 days of amino acid supplementation followed by 7 days of single leg immobilization and 14 days of recovery post-immobilization muscle atrophy will be assessed utilizing percutaneous muscle biopsy to quantify fibre size in the vastus lateralis.

secondary_outcome.description: Strength will be measured using a Biodex.
Muscle size will be assessed via MRI.

arm_group.description: Subjects in this arm will receive amino acid supplementation (5.97g) 3 times daily for 28 days. Amino acids will be provided in powder form to be dissolved in 8oz of water. Participants will also undergo single-leg immobilization (Breg brace) for 7 days (days 8-15) during the 28 day study period.

Subjects in this arm will receive placebo 3 times daily for 28 days. Placebo will consist of 5.75g of maltodextrin (NF grade) dissolved in 8oz of water. Participants will also undergo single-leg immobilization (Breg brace) for 7 days (days 8-15) during the 28 day study period.

intervention.description: 5.97 g amino acid 3 times daily for 28 days
7 days of single leg immobilization; randomized to leg; knee brace will be worn in a fixed flexion position at 140Â°.
5.75 g of placebo (Maltodextrin) 3 times daily for 28 days
